examples.example: 只要努力奋斗，你终有一天会成为自己想要成为的人。

translate.english: As long as you strive hard, you will eventually become the person you want to be one day.

examples.example: 我相信只要坚持不懈地努力，你一定能成为一个优秀的人。

translate.english: I believe that as long as you persevere in your efforts, you will definitely be able to become an excellent person.

examples.example: 只要不断进取，你就能够成为更好的自己。

translate.english: As long as you keep making progress, you will be able to become a better self.
